comments.comment: Are you sure that the  country has no security issues because the winning of the Eelam war has eliminated all threats to the Sinhalese Buddhists from other communities? Are you hiding your head in the sand? Is it that the Tamil and Muslim people voted the UNP not in pursuit of their racist objectives? Do you mean that the Sinhala Budhists overwhelmingly voted Pohottuwa because they are gullible and naive after 70 years of political experience? You believe that the UNP failed to "dress up" the people as cleverly as the Pohottuwa. If the UNP is better for the for the country, please, for the sake of the county, learn from Pohottuwa and "dress up"these childish voters at the next elections. They are not as intelligent as you are.

replies.replyComment: @Ranil Vidya If you are not a coward, why hiding and Insulting?. One should earn a living from a decent career.
@Ranil Vidya It is you who deviated from the problem. Wt I dis was answering your idiotic   questions.

Ranil Vidya  if you know all those very well where even your kids can‚Äôt take benefits out of it ...!! Can you pls let us know about Sri lanken history including 2 civil wars was happen and we are now bottom of tank where struggling to come out ...!!!! Hope you also got education from our nations money who‚Äôs farmers and layman‚Äôs ...!!!

@Wickramasinghe Siri your thoughts are scattered now. yours first was that The whole world is feared of Swiz so are we as Sri Lanka's to be afraid of them. My point simply was that No one attacked Swiz because of not fear but due to the respect  that they have earned. Now you are pointing me for supporting a country threatening our sovereignty. from what world those conclusions. 
Did Swis has kidnapped a Sri Lankan embassy staff in Switzerland. Never heard of. what happened was the other way round.  Now Swis diplomatically exerting there diplomatic rights over the incident is threatening sovereignty to your interpretation. for people like you the easy path to hail the reaction ignoring the cause. my argument is that you must eradicate the causes then there will be no need for such reactions not from  Swis or any other country for that matter.

@Wickramasinghe Siri  To both of you a correction. Name of Hitlers "alugosuwa" is Eichmann (not Eikeman as said before).. He lived in Argentina and not in Brazil as I said before. My memory has faded away since 60s when I followed the Eihmann's trial. Please see Wikipedia to read full story including the photo of the red cross passport he used to escape in to Argentina.

@Ranil Vidya You say "None of the countries had remained for ever neutral.  But the Swis gained their rapport over a long period with neutral diplomacy". Your opinions are contradictory  The worst is that you are going to justify the bad behaviour of another country, which act against the sovereignty of our country.
@Ranil Vidya From the very beginning you said that the Nazis didn't kick the Swiss because of the international ......so and so Now your opinion has changed

@Ranil Vidya Agreed to some extent. However Swiss banks which held (still hold) Nazi wealth and the Red Cross are either directly or indirectly controlled by the Swiss government. Swiss impartiality is not as genuine as people think. They are very smart to cover up their true nature. According to their legal system LTTE is not  a terrorists organisation.

@Sena Alwis None of the countries had remained for ever neutral.  But the Swis gained their rapport over a long period with neutral diplomacy.  during wwii couple of swis generals were pro nazi but not the country . even swis has gun down Germany's bombers.  Any country has betrayals... even we heard our local version of such during war time within the military itself.  For example great Indian liberation leader regard Subash Chandrabosh too locked up to nazis to liberate India from English. that doesn't accused or made India fascist nation. Even our own history reveals of kings who killed their Fathers to become kings.  that doesn't made our nation barbarians. It is the long term history that makes a nation's pride. If it's so true for Sri Lanka then so so for Swis aa well.
